name: Snake Clone (scruff_duff)
description:
I didn't go along with the theme for this jam. I just wanted to challenge myself to make a clone of Snake in 3 hours; this is what I got at the end of it.  It ain't perfect but I set myself a goal of doing a game jam a month this year and only had one day left this month to put something out there!
